content:
TITLE: Validating Google OAuth Environment Variables in AdonisJS
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet for validating Google OAuth client ID and secret in the AdonisJS env.ts file using the schema validation pattern.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adonisjs/ally/blob/5.x/instructions.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID: Env.schema.string(),
GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET: Env.schema.string(),
```

----------------------------------------
